SourceString: [PvP] Fight for the most kills in a free-for-all battle with unlimited respawns.
[PvP] Two teams spawn in completely random spots on the map. Once Defenders have placed the flag, Attackers must locate and capture the flag area.
[PvP] One attacker has been taken hostage by defenders inside a building. Attackers must reach their teammate and get them to the extraction.
[Solo/Co-Op] Search for the intel device in one of several suspected locations, then safely retrieve it to the marked extraction point.
[PvP] Eliminate the opposing team. Individual and collective respawns can be enabled.
[Solo/Co-Op] Locate and eliminate a predetermined number of enemies in the area of operations.
[Solo/Co-Op] Practice your shooting and CQB skills individually or collectively in The Farm's multiple ranges and shoothouses.
[PvP] Defenders guard an intel device in one of several possible locations, as Attackers must locate and hack it to win.
[PvE] Attackers have to find the bombs and defuse them all before the timer runs out.
How quickly the AI can turn (degrees per second)
How quickly the AI can turn while sprinting (degrees per second)
How quickly the suppression value is reduced (per second)
Limit while aiming at a target to be considered 'on target' (+/- degrees)
Bone that AI considers a characters center of mass for aiming purposes
How much time has to pass (in seconds) before the aim miss is set to 0 (for time deviation), deviation based on distance will always be added to this
The maximum deviation (in degrees) that is applied when the AI just spotted the player and time deviation is at its maximum
Maximum deviation (in degrees) due to distance
Minimum distance for distance penalty (in cm)
Maximum distance for max distance penalty (in cm)
How often we should change the aim error alphas
Time it takes to react to just sensed (+/- ReactionTimeRandom) in seconds
How much to randomise ReactionTimeBase by in +/- seconds
Max amount of rounds an AI can fire off in rapid succession in semi-auto firing modes
Min amount of rounds an AI can fire off in rapid succession in full-auto firing modes
Max amount of rounds an AI can fire off in rapid succession in full-auto firing modes
Min delay after last shot is fired in a burst before AI can start another burst
Max delay after last shot is fired in a burst before AI can start another burst
How likely AI is to lean when able (0.0 - 1.0)
AI to fire a tracer round after how many rounds? (0=default for weapon, 1=always, 2=every other round, ...)
Probability that AI shots will have a muzzle flash (0.0 = never, 1.0 = always, -1.0 = use default)
Killhouse round reset\r\nRemember to resupply at the weapon table
